name: Knife Flip - Hit Geometry Cube
description:
Imagine you are knife master. Download now to start throwing.
Hold and throw knife, make knife hit the target.
Enjoy the thrill of continuously hitting the target.
Break the best record in the rankings. Become the best knife master in the world.

FEATURES:
-4 different gameplay
-20 knives with a cool design
-Physics-based realistic knives
-Awesome graphics and sounds
